title: Rustdoc crashed on time crate under FreeBSD

labels.name: I-crash
labels.description: Issue: The compiler crashes (SIGSEGV, SIGABRT, etc). Use I-ICE instead when the compiler panics.

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: T-dev-tools
labels.description: Relevant to the dev-tools subteam, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Every time I try to make documentation for my crate it failed because of time crate. Reproducible 100% of a time. Let me know if more info required.

```
$ gdb -ex r --args rustdoc /home/andoriyu/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-88ac128001ac3a9a/time-0.1.34/src/lib.rs --crate-name time -o /usr/home/andoriyu/Dev/Heaven/angel-whisper/target/doc -L dependency=/usr/home/andoriyu/Dev/Heaven/angel-whisper/target/debug/deps -L dependency=/usr/home/andoriyu/Dev/Heaven/angel-whisper/target/debug/deps --extern winapi=/usr/home/andoriyu/Dev/Heaven/angel-whisper/target/debug/deps/libwinapi-96db160368c72f00.rlib --extern winapi=/usr/home/andoriyu/Dev/Heaven/angel-whisper/target/debug/deps/libwinapi-96db160368c72f00.rlib --extern kernel32=/usr/home/andoriyu/Dev/Heaven/angel-whisper/target/debug/deps/libkernel32-a6ecb7771eb9fd8d.rlib --extern kernel32=/usr/home/andoriyu/Dev/Heaven/angel-whisper/target/debug/deps/libkernel32-a6ecb7771eb9fd8d.rlib --extern libc=/usr/home/andoriyu/Dev/Heaven/angel-whisper/target/debug/deps/liblibc-adb8b8e7aaa2f93f.rlib --extern libc=/usr/home/andoriyu/Dev/Heaven/angel-whisper/target/debug/deps/liblibc-adb8b8e7aaa2f93f.rlib
```
